ISSUE.TITLE: Jekyll example seems outdated
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: In the Jekyll example (https://github.com/zeit/now/tree/master/examples/jekyll) the readme mentions a `package.json` file which doesn't exist, with a build rule to adapt jekyll to the defaults of Zeit. What build command does Zeit run for Jekyll sites? Thanks!

COMMIT.MESSAGE: [examples] Fix jekyll readme build command (#3639) Fixes #3634
